TopicTitle: Presenting the KARU-22 (by Kapitalizing Every Word Industries.)

Articles.Content:
The KARU-22 is a small reconnaissance plane It has a single panther engine and is just shy of being supersonic without the afterburner.
Action groups: 
-1 turn afterburner on/off
-Brakes: toggle flaps

It can take of at 40 m/s making it a good option for carriers
(if you can run a 500 part carrier without your computer exploding) 

Spoiler

KARU stands for Kerbal Aereal Reconnaissance Unit and 22 because that is a random number I just thought of

Download: https://kerbalx.com/KapitalizingEveryWord/KARU-22_2 

 

about the second Image I  crash landed on sea  was testing potential hybrid aircraft functions
